text: The 1984 Summer Paralympics took place in New York City. 1,800 athletes from 45 countries were at the Games. People with these types of disabilities competed at the games: spinal injury, amputee, blindness, cerebral palsy, and Les Autres. ==References== Paralympic Summer Paralympic 1984 Category:Summer Paralympic Games Category:1980s in New York (state) Category:1984 in the United States
title: 1984 Summer Paralympics
